import axios from'axios';const API_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'http://localhost:5000';export const getPurchases=()=>axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"/purchases"));export const createPurchase=data=>axios.post("".concat(API_URL,"/purchases"),data);export const updatePurchase=(id,data)=>axios.put("".concat(API_URL,"/purchases/").concat(id),data);export const deletePurchase=id=>axios.delete("".concat(API_URL,"/purchases/").concat(id));// Sales APIs
export const getSales=()=>axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"/sales"));export const createSale=data=>axios.post("".concat(API_URL,"/sales"),data);export const updateSale=(id,data)=>axios.put("".concat(API_URL,"/sales/").concat(id),data);export const deleteSale=id=>axios.delete("".concat(API_URL,"/sales/").concat(id));// Payments APIs
export const getPayments=()=>axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"/payments"));export const createPayment=data=>axios.post("".concat(API_URL,"/payments"),data);export const updatePayment=(id,data)=>axios.put("".concat(API_URL,"/payments/").concat(id),data);export const deletePayment=id=>axios.delete("".concat(API_URL,"/payments/").concat(id));// Products APIs
export const getProducts=()=>axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"/products"));export const createProduct=data=>axios.post("".concat(API_URL,"/products"),data);export const updateProduct=(id,data)=>axios.put("".concat(API_URL,"/products/").concat(id),data);export const deleteProduct=id=>axios.delete("".concat(API_URL,"/products/").concat(id));// Customers APIs
export const getCustomers=()=>axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"/customers"));export const createCustomer=data=>axios.post("".concat(API_URL,"/customers"),data);export const updateCustomer=(id,data)=>axios.put("".concat(API_URL,"/customers/").concat(id),data);export const deleteCustomer=id=>axios.delete("".concat(API_URL,"/customers/").concat(id));// Invoice detail
export const getSaleInvoice=id=>axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"/sales/").concat(id,"/invoice"));// Dashboard
export const getDashboard=()=>axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"/dashboard"));
